name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro is a flagship smartphone with a stunning Super Retina XDR display, powerful A15 Bionic chip, and advanced Pro camera system for exceptional photos and videos.

name: iPad Pro (2023)
description: Experience the future of productivity with the iPad Pro. Featuring the M2 chip, 120Hz ProMotion display, and compatibility with the Apple Pencil 3, it's the ultimate creative tool.

name: MacBook Pro (M2, 2023)
description: The MacBook Pro sets new standards in performance and design. With the M2 Pro chip, mini-LED display, and enhanced keyboard, it's built for professionals who demand the best.

name: AirPods Pro 2
description: Immerse yourself in premium audio with the AirPods Pro 2. Featuring active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and a comfortable design, it's the ultimate wireless earbud experience.

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: Stay connected and active with the Apple Watch Series 7. With a larger, always-on Retina display, advanced health features, and a range of stylish bands, it's your perfect fitness companion.

name: Mac mini (M2, 2023)
description: The M2 chip, which powers the Mac mini today, provides outstanding performance in a small package. It's an essential component on your desktop, whether you use it for work or play.

name: AirPods Max
description: Elevate your audio experience with the AirPods Max. These over-ear headphones offer high-fidelity sound, active noise cancellation, and a luxurious design for immersive listening.

name: iMac (M2, 2023)
description: The iMac gets a colorful update and the power of the M2 chip. Enjoy a vibrant 24-inch 4.5K Retina display, improved performance, and a sleek design that enhances any workspace.
